00030                                         Point3DDecorator() {

00032         green = 0;
00033         blue = 0;

00037                         Point3DDecorator (point) {

00039         green = 0;
00040         blue = 0;
00041 }

00044                 Point3DDecorator (point) {

00062         blue = point.blue;

00065 ColoredPoint3D::ColoredPoint3D(Point3D* point, unsigned char red, unsigned char green, unsigned char blue) :
00066                 Point3DDecorator (point) {
00067         this->red = red;
00068         this->green = green;
00069         this->blue = blue;

00077 istream& operator>>(istream &inStream, ColoredPoint3D &point) {
00078         unsigned int tmpColor;
00079         Coordinate tmpCoord;
00080 
00081         if (!inStream.good())
00082                 throw runtime_error("ERROR: cannot read x coordinate of point.");
00083         inStream >> tmpCoord;
00084         point.setX(tmpCoord);
00085         if (!inStream.good())
00086                 throw runtime_error("ERROR: cannot read y coordinate of point.");
00087         inStream >> tmpCoord;
00088         point.setY(tmpCoord);
00089         if (!inStream.good())
00090                 throw runtime_error("ERROR: cannot read z coordinate of point.");
00091         inStream >> tmpCoord;
00092         point.setZ(tmpCoord);
00093 
00094         if (!inStream.good())
00095                 throw runtime_error("ERROR: cannot read red color channel of point.");
00096         inStream >> tmpColor;
00097         point.red = static_cast<unsigned char>(tmpColor);
00098 
00099         if (!inStream.good())
00100                 throw runtime_error("ERROR: cannot read green color channel of point.");
00101         inStream >> tmpColor;
00102         point.green = static_cast<unsigned char>(tmpColor);
00103 
00104         if (!inStream.good())
00105                 throw runtime_error("ERROR: cannot read blue color channel of point.");
00106         inStream >> tmpColor;
00107         point.blue = static_cast<unsigned char>(tmpColor);
00108 
00109         return inStream;
00110 }
00111 
00112 ostream& operator<<(ostream &outStream, const ColoredPoint3D &point) {
00113 
00114         outStream << point.getX() << " " << point.getY() << " " << point.getZ();
00115         outStream << " " << static_cast<unsigned int>(point.red);
00116         outStream << " " << static_cast<unsigned int>(point.green);
00117         outStream << " " << static_cast<unsigned int>(point.blue);
00118 
00119         return outStream;
00120 }
00121 
00122 Point3D* ColoredPoint3D::clone() const {
00123         return new ColoredPoint3D(point->clone(), red, green, blue);
00124 }
